Holistic View of the Asset.
The Diagram provides a holistic view of the activities performed on the Asset. i.e. Users who have logged in, emails sent, Removable Drives connected, Malicious Sites accessed and Files accessed.
Select the Asset and Time Period for which the activities needs to be monitored.
